org.lazywizard.console

Enum BaseCommand.CommandContext

  • Enclosing interface:
    BaseCommand

    public enum BaseCommand.CommandContext

    Represents what screen the player was on when they used the command.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • CAMPAIGN_MAP

        org.lazywizard.console.BaseCommand.CommandContext CAMPAIGN_MAP

        Command was entered on the campaign map.

      • CAMPAIGN_MARKET

        org.lazywizard.console.BaseCommand.CommandContext CAMPAIGN_MARKET

        Command was entered in a market.

      • COMBAT_CAMPAIGN

        org.lazywizard.console.BaseCommand.CommandContext COMBAT_CAMPAIGN

        Command was entered during a battle in the campaign (doesn't include simulation battles).

      • COMBAT_MISSION

        org.lazywizard.console.BaseCommand.CommandContext COMBAT_MISSION

        Command was entered during a mission.

      • COMBAT_SIMULATION

        org.lazywizard.console.BaseCommand.CommandContext COMBAT_SIMULATION

        Command was entered during a refit simulation battle.

    • Method Detail

      • isInCombat

        public boolean isInCombat()

        Returns whether this context is on the combat map.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@5cad0fd0: true if the game is on the combat map, false otherwise.

        public boolean isInCampaign()

        Returns whether this context is on the campaign map.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@705c9c0c: true if the game is on the campaign map, false otherwise.

      • isInMarket

        public boolean isInMarket()

        Returns whether the player is interacting with a market-containing entity.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@42ff5984: true if the player is in dialog with a market-containing entity, false otherwise.

      • isCampaignAccessible

        public boolean isCampaignAccessible()

        Returns whether the player is in campaign mode, including in campaign battles (even refit simulation battles).

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@ba3bf8d: true if the player is on the campaign map, in a campaign battle, or running a simulation in a campaign refit screen.
